definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: Other Titles: Some Feelings of Poetry, "The Yellow Wall Paper", and "the Death of Salesman"
sentences.chinese: 对于一些英诗，黄色壁纸，及推销员之死之读后杂感。

sentences.english: A successful businessman has to be aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 一个成功的推销员必须要有闯劲。

sentences.english: For several years he was Watkins' top retail salesman.
sentences.chinese: 他连着几年都是沃特金斯公司的最佳零售推销员。

sentences.english: They were the dupes of a clever but dishonest salesman.
sentences.chinese: 他们被一个聪明但不诚实的推销员骗了。

sentences.english: The salesman brought some samples of his firm's products.
sentences.chinese: 推销员带来了一些他公司的产品货样。

sentences.english: Have you ever spent an evening with an insurance salesman?
sentences.chinese: 你曾经和一个保险推销员待过一整夜么？

sentences.english: The salesman was afraid when he heard what sounded like the mountain breaking.
sentences.chinese: 推销员对山里传出震耳欲聋的响声感到十分害怕。
听了这话，女推销员彬彬有礼地报以微笑。

sentences.english: If you want to be a good salesman, you must be thick-skinned.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要成为一个好的推销员，你一定要厚脸皮。

sentences.english: I tell the newspaper salesman I don't need a subscription.
sentences.chinese: 告诉报纸推销员我不要订报。

sentences.english: The salesman padded the bill for his travelling expenses by exaggerating his food expenses.
sentences.chinese: 推销员夸大伙食费的开支来虚报出差费。

sentences.english: I HAs get five ages' experience dawn a company as a salesman.
sentences.chinese: 一自己曾在某一自己搞担任推销员，前后有五年之久。

sentences.english: I'm writing to you about the possibility of working as a Salesman for your company.
sentences.chinese: 今写此信想了解一下能否来贵公司担任推销员。

sentences.english: Friendly persuasion is the stock-in-trade of every salesman.
sentences.chinese: 友好的劝说是每个推销员的惯用手法。

sentences.english: The salesman is carolling the glories of the company.
sentences.chinese: 推销员正在歌颂公司的辉煌成就。

sentences.english: Apparently, I lacked nearly all the attributes of the master salesman.
sentences.chinese: 显然，我缺乏高明的推销员所拥有的所有特质。

definition: variant of 老闆|老板[lao3 ban3]
to rock/to sway/to flicker (e.g. of lights reflected on water)/to flutter (e.g. of a flag)/to trick sb into doing sth/to dupe/to con
